query:
INSERT INTO requirements (frameworkId, articleNumber, title, description, category, riskLevelApplicable, isMandatory) VALUES 
-- TC260 Corpus Safety Requirements
(3, '4.1.1', 'Corpus Source Safety Assessment', 'Conduct safety assessment on corpus sources before collection. Sources with >5% illegal/unhealthy content cannot be used.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.1.2', 'Corpus Source Diversity', 'Ensure diversity of corpus sources with multiple sources for each language and different content types (text, images, audio, video).', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.1.3', 'Corpus Traceability', 'Maintain open-source license agreements, transaction contracts, and collection records for all corpus sources.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.2.1', 'Content Filtering', 'Filter illegal and unhealthy information using keywords, classification models, and manual spot checks.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.2.2', 'IPR Management', 'Dedicated personnel for IPR management, risk assessment before training, and complaint channels for IPR issues.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.2.3', 'Personal Information Consent', 'Obtain consent for personal information in corpus; separate consent required for sensitive personal information.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.3.1', 'Annotator Training', 'Provide safety training for annotators including task rules, tool usage, quality verification, and security requirements.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '4.3.2', 'Annotation Role Separation', 'Separate data annotation and data review functions; no annotator may hold both roles simultaneously.', 'Corpus Safety', 'all', 1);
